sources.title: Shadows on the Stairs
sources.description: A U.S. film set in a London boarding house in the year 1937.

sources.title: Shadows on the Stairs (1941) TURHAN BEY â™  MYSTERY
sources.description:
Stars: Frieda Inescort, Paul Cavanagh, Turhan Bey, Heather Angel
 Director: D. Ross Lederman

 Occupants of a London boarding house become suspects as a string of murders are discovered.

sources.title: Shadows on the Stairs (upgraded)
sources.description: This version has improved video quality, and is minus the glitches in the other copy here at IA Murders in a London lodging house. An ensemble cast features Frieda Inescort, Paul Cavanaugh, Heather Angel, Bruce Lester, Miles Mander and Turhan Bey in his first film role. Directed by D Ross Lederman. Released in 1941. Complete print

metadata.Plot: Occupants of a London boarding house become suspects as a string of murders are committed.
metadata.Actors: Frieda Inescort, Paul Cavanagh, Heather Angel
